featured.text: In his early adulthood, he even drifted toward communism.
Children under 14 who watch horror movies have a greater chance of developing anxiety later in adulthood.

definition.zh_def: 成年期，指一個人達到法律或社會上被認為是成年人所需的年齡階段。
definition.en_def: The state or condition of being fully grown or developed, typically recognized as the period in life after reaching the age of majority.
definition.example: Adulthood brings new responsibilities and challenges.
